name: 被坏女人骗成冒险者!
description:
2D side-scrolling rpg, clap mobs! get stronger! build your own broken set!
Let's progress as a adventurer with our main character and complete the ultimate quest!

(the game currently does not support English sorry about that! however, it is still totally playable because we all gamers!)

Beat mobs, level up, gain attack or health stats. And mostly importantly: Unlock new unique weapons each with thier unique ability. Combine them into your dream set, either you feel like taking any boss's attack while laughing, or one shotting anything that is on your way. The choice is up to you. And perhaps you want to be a hardcore gamer, only using the starter set without leveling up your stats.

The point is, you can play the game in multiple ways, and it might be tons of fun? Try it out!
(The game is still not nearly finished, currently there are 2 zones. The final plan is to have 8 and much more unique items. And you might find a few bugs here and there)
